reviewText: Gifted toddlers that are always thinking and are inquisitive like their 7 year old counterparts must see this. My  3 1/2 year old son is fascinated with this excellent series. Overall, I give it 5 stars !
Title: Popular Mechanics For Kids: Season 1 - 5

reviewText: Educational for kids and they learn a lot especially if they love science and are adventures. Recommend for all kids
Title: Popular Mechanics For Kids: Season 1 - 5

reviewText: Popular Mechanics really makes these very educational as well as fun for the kids.  My son loves these PopularMechanics DVD's.
Title: Popular Mechanics For Kids: Season 1 - 5

reviewText: My 4 1/2 year old likes these.  He doesn't ask for them like he does some of the other cartoons and such but when I do turn them on, he is interested and learns from them.  Bonus is that I really like them and learn from them too!!  He might be a little young for them but not so much that he loses interest immediately.
Title: Popular Mechanics For Kids: Season 1 - 5

reviewText: Very Educational and reported by kids. I bought this for my grandchildren. My granddaughter and grandson are in school and thought this would be a great resource for when they need to write reports on subjects in school with 22 episodes on 5 disks, there is bound to be something of interest for them to learn about. I personally thought they were excellent and kept my attention even on subjects that really don't interest me.
Title: Popular Mechanics For Kids: Season 1 - 5
